content: Excited to share this volunteer opportunity! Second Harvest Heartland is hosting a community food drive next weekend. Sign up and help make a difference!
Tree Trust is hiring Community Engagement Coordinators! If you're passionate about urban forestry and environmental justice in Minneapolis, this is the perfect opportunity.
Just finished organizing our community mural project! So proud of how our neighborhood came together to create something beautiful. Art really does bring people together! ðŸŽ¨
Looking for volunteers to help with our coding bootcamp for underserved youth. If you have programming skills and want to make a difference, DM me!
Our school's community garden is thriving! The kids are so excited to see their vegetables growing. Teaching them about sustainable living and healthy eating. ðŸŒ±
